channel.title: -Codeing 508-
channel.description: [center]Alright So I'm Codeing A 508 Source, I'm Noticeing This, Every Time i code, that i can't find, Where Too Make Npcs Spawn & Adding The Items, I Searched Everywhere, What Do I Get? Nothing , If Anyone Knows Where Too Spawn Npcs, And Make There Cords, I'd Appreiciate it, if you'd share your work with me.[/center]

item.title: -Codeing 508-
item.dc:creator: @blood5 blood5
item.description:
@blood5 wrote:

[code]omfg
GO TO AUTOSPAWN.CFG!!!
AND OF U WANT THEM TO DROP ITEMS READ BLOW
Go to item2.java or npcdrop.cfg
i be showing what to add in item2

 public static int Man[] = {, 995 , 995};

    public static int randomMan() {
        return chicken[(int) (Math.random() * chicken.length)];
    }

now go to npchandler.java and add this

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid) {
                                ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomskeleton(),
                                        npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,
                                        GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
                            }

ok man is the npc name put it to npc name u want and npcid id that npc id like 1 is for man
now for npcdrop.cfg
open up npcdrop.cfg and u going to see somthing like this

npcdrop = 2263	5509	1	10

ok 2263 is the npc id
5509 is the item id
1 is how much it going to drop
10 is % or 10%
there
[/code]

Read full topic
